soen6441.kingdoms.core
Class Board

java.lang.Object
  soen6441.kingdoms.core.Board

public class Board
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents the board with 5 rows and 6 columns and a function to place the Placeable(tile or castle) on the Board

setPlacable

public int setPlacable(Placeable plc,
                       int i,
                       int j)
Method to place a tile or castle on the board

Parameters:
plc - The object to be placed on the board.Which could be a tile or a castle
i - The index of the row where the object should be placed
j - The index of the column where the object should be placed
Returns:
0 If the tile was successfully placed and 1 if the tile could not be placed at the specified location
